top_categories.workout_context: Berryman Epic's Missouri Berryman Trail, Mixed surfaces forces constant power changes. Surge over the rough stuff, settle on the smooth, repeat for 65 miles.
Race-pace efforts that mimic Berryman Epic's demands. Pacing, fueling, and tactical decisions under fatigue. Practice the race before October.
69ft/mi means long efforts at or near FTP on every climb. If your threshold cracks at minute 15, you'll walk the rest.
How long can you hold 105% FTP before you blow? At Berryman Epic, that number decides whether you bridge or get dropped.
At Berryman Epic, surges push you above threshold and you have to recover while still riding. Over-unders train exactly that.
88–92% FTP is where you'll spend the hardest sustained miles of Berryman Epic. Train it until it feels boring.
65 miles on Missouri Berryman Trail mixed surfaces burns energy faster than the distance suggests. Train the fade resistance now.
When someone attacks on Missouri Berryman Trail mixed surfaces, you have 10 seconds to respond or you're off the back. This builds that response.
Short, max efforts are unavoidable. Punchy climbs, gap closures, attacks on Missouri Berryman Trail mixed surfaces. If you haven't trained them, you'll crack.
Smooth pedaling at 65 miles saves muscle. Bad technique at mile 10 is invisible. At mile 80 it's a cramp.
Varied gradients on Missouri Berryman Trail mixed surfaces demand climbing versatility. Sit the shallow stuff, stand the steep stuff, switch without thinking.
Double-threshold training builds sustained power with less fatigue. More FTP per hour of training.

race_overlay.nutrition: Target 40–60g carbs/hour for Berryman Epic’s 65 miles. Front-load calories in the first half. One bottle per hour minimum, more in heat.
race_overlay.terrain: Highly technical terrain at Berryman Epic demands practice on similar surfaces. Ride missouri berryman trail mixed surfaces at race-day cadence weekly. Expect: missouri berryman trail, mixed surfaces, ozark foothills. Practice cornering, descending, and power delivery on unstable surfaces. Dial in tire pressure before race week — 5 PSI wrong costs you 15+ minutes over 65 miles.

pack_summary: This 10-workout pack focuses on Gravel Specific, Race Simulation, and TT Threshold to prepare you for 65 miles of missouri berryman trail mixed surfaces in Potosi, Missouri.
